SHIPPING AND DELIVERY


We ship throughout the week, except Sundays & Public holidays. Orders within India are generally dispatched within 2-3 working days. International orders are dispatched within 7 working days. Due to the current lockdown in Tamil Nadu, please expect some delays in shipment.


Please note: Some of our products currently have a 10 day waiting period. You will see this mentioned on the product page. Most orders are delivered within 3-7 working days post shipping in India, and international orders could take up to 20 days, depending on your location. For international orders, customs could be applied based on the laws in your country. We are not responsible for any customs or duty charges incurred.


Within a day after the product has been shipped, you will receive a mail with the tracking number.


If you think you have received the product in a bad condition or if the packaging is tampered with or damaged before delivery, please call our customer care at +91 94456 80500 between Monday to Friday, 10 AM to 6 PM, or email us at info@ladderminds.com mentioning your Order ID.


Once the product has left our warehouse, AvionWear will not be held responsible in cases of delayed deliveries caused due to any unforeseen circumstances faced by our courier partners. In case of such delays, you can get in touch with us and we will do what is in our power to get your product to you at the earliest.


We Ship Through DTDC Couriers
